JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Teamleader m/f for future piglet production at Glasholm Grisgård / Sweden
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
If you are looking for a challenge and your personal development also on a farm in Sweden, then you have the chance to become a team leader for a modern pig production at Glasholm Grisgård by Kristina and Håkon Lennartsson.

About the company and the production scope:

Glasholm Grisgård, is a modern farm with new and renovated stables equipped with the latest techniques according to Danish and German principles. The farm is located near Kalmar and includes space for 600 sows and is being started up with a piglet production up to 30 kg, where the farrowing pen runs with farrowings in a 14-day rhythm. In addition to Lennart and Kristina, 2 more employees work on the farmWe expect:

  • Experienced from similar position and trained
  • Good teamwork skills
  • Good approach to work with animals
  • Routined and result-oriented, good sense of order
  • Speaking a Scandinavian language or at least English

Your tasks will be:

  • Start up piglet production
  • Leading responsibility for 2 colleagues
  • Planning of production processes
  • Ordering of feeds
  • Collaboration with colleagues on the farm

We offer:

  • Independent position / ful time
  • Influence on the startup production
  • Work in new modernized stables
  • To be part of a good team
  • Professional courses if needed
  • Salary according to qualifications
  • Accommodations on the farm

There will be ongoing interviews with candidates for the position. Date of employment is by agreement but preferably as soon as possible. We will wait for the right person for the position.
